name: Apocalypse: Rise of the Zombies
description:
Apocalypse: Rise of the Zombies is my first ever game created with Unity. This is a game that I was tasked with creating only with the premise that it was to be a Zombie Survival game.

There are three levels for you to traverse and also a tutorial so that you can get to grips with the game itself.

You will need to download the .7z file and un-zip it anywhere on your computer, as long as the _Data file is found alongside the .exe in any directory you choose.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

LMB - Fire bullets

Mouse - Look in the direction of the pointer
